pinyin: zhen1 jin1 bu4 pa4 huo3 lian4

definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86

sentences.english: The fire is the test of gold, adversity of strong man.
sentences.chinese: 真金不怕火煉，災難能使人強壯。

sentences.english: The sincerity of a friendship is tested by some dangers, as gold is by fire.
sentences.chinese: 友誼忠誠不怕危險，十足真金不怕火煉。

sentences.english: Fire is the test of gold; adversity, of strong men.
sentences.chinese: 真金不怕火煉，逆境是強者的試金石。

sentences.english: True gold fears no fire; A person of integrity can stand servere tests.
sentences.chinese: 真金不怕火煉，真英雄不怕遭遇挫折。
